name: Deep See Diver
description:
Hi!

I want to show you my first game. It's a platformer game in the see deeps environment. It took a lot of time because I needed to learn C#, 

 Unity, and pixelart drawing at the same time. Only music is from free online sources :). 

I know the controls are rather clumsy and there are lots of details to polish. I plan to fix all of it in the future - I still like the concept - but smaller new projects give more opportunities to learn. 

Thank you for your time, hope you like to enjoy it a little. Feel free to leave some criticisms and advice in the comments :)

Cheers!
